title: When you go 21/0/2 with Vi, and still don't get an S+
body:
Rito is like: 
http://static7.comicvine.com/uploads/scale_super/14/147508/4799195-tumblr_ma7gkicjld1qke34uo1_500.gif

I am like:
http://couldneverdothat.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/howgif.gif

replies.body:
http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/e/ea/Red_Melee_MinionSquare.png
http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/1/10/Red_Caster_MinionSquare.png
http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/f/f6/Red_Cannon_MinionSquare.png
http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/0/04/Red_Super_MinionSquare.png

Only by killing more of these can you unlock the secret.

http://media2.popsugar-assets.com/files/thumbor/9A2KaYGYSY35onlhfSZ9r-Zu1Ss/fit-in/2048xorig/filters:format_auto-!!-:strip_icc-!!-/2016/03/17/991/n/1922283/9f53448dfcb43b18_Sheldon-the-big-bang-theory-16534411-500-249/i/Oh-Should-I-Writing-Down.gif
{{champion:75}} _Yet another reason for me to never leave lane for your boosted ass_
https://media.giphy.com/media/zR2YqYnqe2IVO/giphy.gif
http://www.reactiongifs.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/10/i_like_you.gif
Ward.

https://media.giphy.com/media/SXcgjAPQnWOhW/giphy.gif
Warding is the supports job only.

http://i.imgur.com/HlEEgNf.jpg

https://media.giphy.com/media/IFnUKcusZgI/giphy.gif

Did someone say Vi?...

https://66.media.tumblr.com/f81f6ddffa08e7b6de279c771e1c4ab2/tumblr_n7dq7zvjJZ1rs3n7wo1_500.gif

Indeed I did. Almost rank 6, need 1 more S-
http://67.media.tumblr.com/e110ab2e7372d627b9d52e821d4fadad/tumblr_mysq851cJu1s4ddyqo1_400.gif

I need to get her to level 5 fi(r)st
I don't play a lot recently though, work and all.

Then u get a s+ with soraka
http://25.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m7at8gXgxv1rojin5o1_500.gif
As a jungler, you really need to farm alot to get that S+ from my experience.

Mostly just depends on farm.
But why farm minions when you can farm champions?

I got a Pentakill with Evelynn going Legendary
i dont think i even got an S- just a shitty A
I feel you. Went 38/0/12 on Eve and got an A-. I had 126 farm. I guess that is why.
With that many kills, you don't need cs. You farmed people instead.
I probably would have gotten more gold from the cs. Now, whenever I get 20+ kills on eve, I start farming a lane we just killed like mad.
You just have to build locket so every time someone next to you is going to get a kill you get an assist regardless if they needed the shield or not.

#\#Nami Ult Mechanics

{{champion:267}} Pentassists for days!
@{{champion:37}}
Your kill participation percentage needs to be higher. That's a big reason why. Your wards are decent. Superb if we compare it to your support.

Reminds me of a game I played with Worst Mord NA a few weeks back:
(Me) {{champion:41}} 1/2/7
(Worst Mord NA) {{champion:82}} 14/6/10

We both got an A+
LIES, we all know Worst Morde NA doesn't play Morde.
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2246949927/209877961?tab=overview

11/0/7 Yorick, 24/7 Urgot, 18/9 Jinx, an A and two B's. WHY MUST THE UNIMPORTANT MINIONS BE WORTH SO MUCH?! Stupid minions only worth something in the early game or to push lanes late. I certainly don't need them for the gold or xp they give me. *Grumble grumble* *incoherent mumbling*

S+ with soraka, barely any minions and 2 more in team got s and s-... but what does that matter when you only get 1 chest per champ?
So I've gotten 3 S's and 0 chests for playing the champ that I find is the funnest for me. And I also can't make it mastery 6 cuz you need a "Permenant champion" and they forgot to add the "shard" there so I fought like crazy for that S and now they want me to gamble my money to get it or play sucky champs that I hate to play for a chance in a thousand... GG Riot.

Anyway, S+ on soraka with 6/8/55 and only 29 minions and I also took down 4 towers, assisted... and team took 5 dragons plus 1 baron.
So yeah, other times I've had "perfect" score with 0 deaths, loads of assists and a few kills but no S.

One more S for rank 7 kata
26/8 carried A+
23/10 once again carried A+
16/2 S-
;-; rly

Your KD in the first one is about 3/1
The second one is about 2/1
and the third one is 8/1.
21/0/2 sounds like you AFK farmed and killed the support every time they respawned.

> [{quoted}](name=FA Quaker,realm=OCE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=RRoi5ikv,comment-id=0012,timestamp=2016-08-07T10:37:04.428+0000)
>
> ... and killed the support every time they respawned.

{{champion:27}} ... And here I've been base proxying for ages and never thought to do that! GENIUS.
{{champion:202}} how do i get an S on this bastard ?

> [{quoted}](name=Ace Access ,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=RRoi5ikv,comment-id=0013,timestamp=2016-08-07T13:30:57.920+0000)
>
> {{champion:202}} how do i get an S on this bastard ?

Positive kills by at least ten (example 21/11/9 Constant pink ward and trinket wards. 300cs in a 30 minute game.

Just go blind pick with friends. Rekt your enemies and you will see the s c: 

Gave up with trying to get an s with Ekko in went to blink pick with a group of friends carried them twice and got 2 s :D 

Also a friend of mine who is in plat told me he would flash to last hit towers. Now I'm not saying to do this, but it worked for him. Play with friends who are nice so you can minion tax them a lot.

GET MORE CS NERD

Seriously Farm is a big factor in the grade

The grade is heavily based on your "peers" and the scores they get. That's why it's damn near impossible to get lv 7 on certain champs and   some champs you can borderline intent. feed and still somehow get an S.
Maybe get some dragons and hit some towers you know things that actually matter.
Considering how shitty Divers are right now, getting so many kills without a single death is pretty much a miracle.
I can't do better, and don't call me Shirley.

Must get more cs, ggez

gotta ward more than support, ggez
